Posts.Content: Jul 1, 2011 04:08AM habbott wrote: Hi, Six weeks out from a BMX- LCIS one side and prophylactic the other.  Have tissue expanders that were filled with 100ml approx at time of MX and have had one top up since.  Exchange surgery in two weeks.  Very happy to have symmetry and reduced risk of further cancer.  Recovery was not too hard aside from sleeping on my back! Helen
Posts.Title: Bilateral vs. Unilateral Mastectomy WorkingMom10 habbott
